plang.parser

Class TermParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • plang.parser.AbstractParser<ExpressionNode>
      • plang.parser.ExpressionParser
        • plang.parser.TermParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parser

    public class TermParser
extends ExpressionParser
    Parses a term and returns an ExpressionNode (if not optimized) but allow for precedence rules to apply. A TermParser parses the "higher" precedence operators * and / 
     term ::= factor '*' term |
          factor '/' term
    Author:
    Isak Karlsson

        The tokens denoting valid operators for an expression (i.e. + and - in the default implementation) If getValidOperators() is overriden, override ExpressionParser.convert(TokenType) to reflect this.
